name: roughshod
content:
ride roughshod over someone/something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to do what you want without giving any attention to other people or their wishes: They accused the government of riding roughshod over parliamentary procedure. The Prime Minister rides roughshod over his critics.
More examplesFewer examplesIt doesn't pay to alienate your major shareholders by riding roughshod over their wishes in this way.The company is riding roughshod over the man in the street.Who gave them the power to ride roughshod over the law?
